pkgmetadata.longdescription: Additive Model for Ordinal Data using Laplace P-Splines // Additive proportional odds model for ordinal data using Laplace P-splines. The combination of Laplace approximations and P-splines enable fast and flexible inference in a Bayesian framework. Specific approximations are proposed to account for the asymmetry in the marginal posterior distributions of non- penalized parameters. For more details, see Lambert and Gressani (2023) doi:10.1177/1471082X231181173 ; Preprint: arXiv:2210.01668).
